trans-unit.source: Represents the configurable execution environment provided by the workflow run-time engine for workflows.
trans-unit.target: Representerer konfigurerbare kjøring miljøet fra arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren for arbeidsflyter.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WorkflowRuntime exposes functionality required by a host application and services to configure and control the workflow run-time engine and to be notified of changes to both the workflow run-time engine and any of its workflow instances.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowRuntime viser funksjonaliteten som kreves av et vertsnavn-program og tjenester til å konfigurere og kontrollere arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren som skal varsles om endringer i arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren og noen av dennes arbeidsflytforekomster.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> is initialized with the default property values and contains the default core services.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>er initialisert med standard egenskapsverdier og inneholder standard kjernetjenestene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: To additionally configure the workflow run-time engine, you can add and remove services by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>, and you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil i tillegg konfigurere arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren, kan du legge til og fjerne tjenester ved hjelp av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>, og du kan angi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> is configured, call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> to start the workflow run-time engine and its services.
trans-unit.target: Etter den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>er konfigurert, og kall <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>til å starte arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren og tjenestene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>klassen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>|"WorkflowRuntime"| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>|`false`| The default core services are <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService>.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>|" WorkflowRuntime "| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>| `false`| Standard kjernetjenestene er <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> class by using the specified section of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte delen av programmets konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> is initialized according to the settings in the section specified by `configSectionName` in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>er initialisert i samsvar med innstillingene i delen angitt av `configSectionName` i programmets konfigurasjonsfil.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: `configSectionName` must correspond to a valid `workflowSettings` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: `configSectionName`må samsvare med en gyldig `workflowSettings` delen av konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow run-time engine is configured by using an application configuration file, it loads and instantiates classes of the types listed in the `Services` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Når arbeidsflyten kjøretid-motoren er konfigurert ved hjelp av en programmets konfigurasjonsfil, laster inn, og starter klasser av typene som er oppført i den `Services` delen av konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow run-time engine constructs these classes it looks for class constructors with the following signatures in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Når arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren bygger disse klasser det ser ut for klassekonstruktører med følgende signaturer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters) 2.
trans-unit.target: Service(WorkflowRuntime Runtime, NameValueCollection Parameters) 2.

trans-unit.target: Service(WorkflowRuntime Runtime) 3.

trans-unit.target: Service(NameValueCollection Parameters) 4.

trans-unit.target: Service() alle tjeneste klasser som er lastet inn fra en konfigurasjonsfil må implementere minst én av disse konstruktøren signaturer.

trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection>

trans-unit.target: Navnet på en gyldig <xref uid="langword_csharp_workflowSettings" name="workflowSettings" href=""> </xref> -delen i programmets konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> finnes allerede for denne programdomene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> class by using the settings in the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av innstillingene i den angitte <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This constructor provides a mechanism to configure the workflow run-time engine using a single method call for hosts that do not use an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren inneholder en metode for å konfigurere arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren med et enkelt metodekall for verter som ikke bruker en programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: There are many reasons for not using the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes mange årsaker til at du ikke bruker programmets konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: A host can run in an environment that does not allow using configuration files; for example, in trusted environments that do not allow reading from the application configuration file for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: Vert kan kjøre i et miljø som ikke tillater at bruker konfigurasjonsfiler; for eksempel i klarerte miljøer som ikke tillater lesing fra programmets konfigurasjonsfil av sikkerhetsgrunner.

trans-unit.source: Also, a host can use a proprietary configuration mechanism; for example, the host can store the workflow run-time engine configuration settings in a SQL database.
trans-unit.target: Vert kan også bruke en proprietær konfigurasjonen mekanisme; verten kan for eksempel lagre arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren konfigurasjonsinnstillingene i en SQL-database.

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine loads and instantiates classes of the types contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection.Services%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren laster inn og starter klasser av typene i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection.Services%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection.Services%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Når arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren bygger disse klasser det ser ut for klassekonstruktører med følgende signaturer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.target: Service(WorkflowRuntime Runtime, NameValueCollection Parameters) 2.

trans-unit.target: Service(WorkflowRuntime Runtime) 3.

trans-unit.source: Service(NameValueCollection parameters) 4.
trans-unit.target: Service(NameValueCollection Parameters) 4.

trans-unit.target: Service() alle tjeneste klasser som er angitt i `settings` må implementere minst én av disse konstruktøren signaturer.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> finnes allerede for denne programdomene.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte tjenesten arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren.

trans-unit.source: You can configure the workflow run-time engine by adding core services.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren ved å legge til core services.

trans-unit.source: Core services are those that derive from any of the following service base classes: the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: Core services er de som er avledet fra en av følgende tjenesten basisklassene: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>klassen <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>klasse, til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klassen, og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: Core services can only be added when the workflow run-time engine is not running; that is, when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Core services kan bare legges ved kjøretid arbeidsflytmotoren ikke kjører. Det vil si, når <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>er `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> can also be used as a storage container for other services that can be used by other workflows or by applications running on a host.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>kan også brukes som en lagring beholder for andre tjenester som kan brukes av andre arbeidsflyter eller programmer som kjører på en vert.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: If you add a non-core service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class after the workflow run-time engine has been started, AddService calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method implemented by that service.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du legger til en ikke-core-tjeneste som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen etter arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren har startet, AddService kaller den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metoden implementeres av denne tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > AddService enforces the restriction that no two services of the same <xref:System.Type> can be added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AddService fremtvinger begrensningen som ingen to tjenester i den samme som <xref:System.Type>kan legges til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: However, you can add multiple services that derive from the same base class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid ikke legge til flere tjenester som er avledet fra den samme basisklassen.

trans-unit.source: There can be only one service derived from each of the following service base classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>: the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class.
trans-unit.target: Det kan være bare én tjeneste som er avledet fra hver av følgende tjenesten basisklasser i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>: { <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>klasse, til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>klassen, og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: If you add multiple services derived from one of these classes, for example two persistence services, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du legger til flere tjenester som er avledet fra en av disse klassene, for eksempel to utholdenhet tjenester, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>oppstår det et <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the service to add.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer tjenesten å legge til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new workflow instance by using the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny arbeidsflytforekomst ved hjelp av den angitte arbeidsflyten <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> is created, validation is executed on it.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>er opprettet, validering er utført på den.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: If any validation errors occur, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår valideringsfeil, den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException>

trans-unit.source: This works well for simple scenarios, but in a server environment, revalidating a workflow for every activation might be unnecessary overhead.
trans-unit.target: Dette fungerer bra for enkel scenarioer, men i et servermiljø med ny validering av en arbeidsflyt for hver aktivering kanskje unødvendige overhead.

trans-unit.target: workflowTypeer et nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To shut down the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> gracefully, you should only call Dispose after you have called <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Avsluttes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>webområdet, bør du bare kalle avhending når du har kalt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: This is because calling the Dispose method alone leaves the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fordi du kaller opp fjerningsmetoden alene forlater den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Dispose frees the resources used by the runtime by closing open file handles, database connections, and so on, but it does not unload workflow instances, stop services, or do any of the other actions that <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> does.
trans-unit.target: Avhending frigjør ressursene som brukes av kjøretiden lukker åpne filreferanser, databasetilkoblinger og så videre, men den har ikke laste arbeidsflytforekomster, stoppe tjenester eller utføre andre handlinger som <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>samsvarer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Dispose should be called only when the host application must free the resources used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> before they are automatically freed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: Avhending må kalles når vertsprogrammet må frigjøre ressursene som brukes av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>før de frigis automatisk av saneringsoppsamlingen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: For general information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha generell informasjon om avhending, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the services that are added to the workflow run-time engine that implement or derive from the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Henter alle tjenestene som er lagt til arbeidsflyten kjøretid-motoren som implementerer eller være avledet fra den angitte <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the workflow instances currently loaded in memory.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder alle arbeidsflytforekomster som er lastet inn i minnet.

trans-unit.source: Note that, unlike <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A>, this method does not throw a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the runtime is not started.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at, i motsetning til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A>, denne metoden ikke slette en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>Hvis kjøretiden ikke er startet.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref> object for each workflow instance currently loaded in memory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> objekt for hver arbeidsflytforekomsten som er lastet inn i minnet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a service of the specified <xref:System.Type> from the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Henter en tjeneste på angitt <xref:System.Type>fra arbeidsflyten kjøretid-motoren.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: GetService throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if more than one service exists for the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: GetService oppstår en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>Hvis det finnes mer enn én tjeneste for den angitte <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should use one of the overloaded methods of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetAllServices%2A> if it is possible that multiple services of the specified type are present in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor bør du bruke en av overbelastede metoder for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetAllServices%2A>Hvis det er mulig at flere tjenester for den angitte typen finnes i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetAllServices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the workflow run-time engine may have multiple tracking services.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren kan for eksempel ha flere sporing-tjenester.

trans-unit.source: If you request a tracking service by specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> base class, it is possible that an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ber om en Sporingstjenesten ved å angi den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>basisklassen, det er mulig at vil bli utløst et unntak.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>på tjenesten som skal hente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The service of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten for den angitte <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: serviceType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeer et nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> er allerede fjernet av.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the workflow instance that has the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Henter arbeidsflytforekomsten som har den angitte <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: If `instanceId` specifies a workflow instance that is not currently in memory, the workflow instance is loaded into memory and scheduled for execution.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `instanceId` angir en arbeidsflytforekomst som ikke er for øyeblikket i minnet, arbeidsflytforekomsten er lastet inn i minnet og planlegges for kjøring.

trans-unit.source: For example, after a workflow instance is aborted, you can call GetWorkflow to load the workflow instance back into memory.
trans-unit.target: Når en arbeidsflytforekomst er avbrutt, kan du for eksempel kalle GetWorkflow for å laste inn arbeidsflytforekomsten tilbake i minnet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the last persisted state of the workflow instance is loaded into memory by the persistence service.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den siste faste tilstanden til arbeidsflytforekomsten er lastet inn i minnet av utholdenhet-tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>for en arbeidsflytforekomst.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref> that has the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> som har den angitte <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime is not started.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyt-kjøretiden er ikke startet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow run-time engine has been started.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om arbeidsflyten kjøretid-motoren er startet.

trans-unit.source: IsStarted indicates that the workflow run-time engine services are running.
trans-unit.target: IsStarted indikerer at arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren-tjenester kjører.

trans-unit.source: IsStarted is `false` until the host calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: IsStarted er `false` før vert kall <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: It remains `true` until the host calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det er fortsatt `true` før vert kall <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot add core services to the workflow run-time engine while it is running.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan legge til kjerner services arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren mens den kjører.

trans-unit.source: Core services are services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: Core services er tjenester som er avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>klassen, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>klasse, til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klassen, og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow run-time engine has been started; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren har startet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot set Name while the workflow run-time engine is running (<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi navnet mens arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren kjører (<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> er `true`).</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet som er tilknyttet denne <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set Name on a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> that is disposed occurs.
trans-unit.target: Et forsøk på å angi navnet på en <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> som er fjernet forekommer.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set Name while the workflow run-time engine is running occurs.
trans-unit.target: Et forsøk på å angi navnet mens arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren kjører forekommer.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service from the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner den angitte tjenesten fra arbeidsflyten kjøretid-motoren.

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove a core service while the workflow run-time engine is running (<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke fjerne en kjerner tjeneste mens arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren kjører (<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> er `true`).</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Core services are services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: Core services er tjenester som er avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>klassen, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>klasse, i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klassen, eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: If `service` derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class, RemoveService calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method implemented by `service`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `service` er avledet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klasse RemoveService kall den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metoden implementeres av `service`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the service to remove.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer tjenesten å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: service is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serviceer et nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> is already disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> er allerede fjernet av.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a service that is derived from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"></xref> class calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent*>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en tjeneste som er avledet av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"> </xref> klasse kall <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent*>

trans-unit.source: A service that is derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to inform subscribers to the ServicesExceptionNotHandled event that an exception that it was unable to handle occurred during its execution.
trans-unit.target: En tjeneste som er avledet av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen kan kalle den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>metode for å informere abonnenter ServicesExceptionNotHandled hendelsen som oppstod et unntak som ikke kunne håndtere under kjøringen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: You can subscribe to this event to implement a recovery mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Du kan abonnere på denne hendelsen til å implementere et mekanisme.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when a workflow instance has not been created yet by the workflow run-time engine and an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en arbeidsflytforekomst som ikke har blitt opprettet ennå av arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren og oppstår et unntak.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the only way to inform a host application that an exception occurred is to raise this event.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet er den eneste måten å informere et vertsnavn-program som oppstod et unntak opphøye denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: However, the workflow run-time engine does not call this directly.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid kaller arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren ikke dette direkte.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the workflow run-time engine either delivers an exception to the workflow instance or, if there is no instance, throws back to the caller, which in this case is actually the service that fires this event.
trans-unit.target: I stedet arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren enten leverer et unntak til arbeidsflytforekomsten eller, hvis det er ingen forekomst, oppstår det tilbake til oppkalleren, som er i dette tilfellet faktisk tjenesten som starter hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If you create your own persistence or scheduler service, you must implement this event yourself through the base <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter din egen utholdenhet eller tjenesten, må du implementere denne hendelsen selv via grunntallet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>metode.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the ServicesExceptionNotHandled event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that was using the service and the <xref:System.Exception> that could not be handled.
trans-unit.target: For hendelsen ServicesExceptionNotHandled avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Guid>av arbeidsflytforekomsten ble ved hjelp av tjenesten og <xref:System.Exception>som ikke kan håndteres.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow run-time engine is started.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren startes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> method raises the Started event after it has validated the core service configuration of the workflow run-time engine, has invoked the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method implemented by each of its services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class, and has set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>metoden viser Started-hendelsen når den validert kjerner tjenestekonfigurasjonen arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren, er aktivert i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metoden implementert av hver av tjenestene som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klasse, og har satt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee about the order in which the services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class are started by the workflow run-time engine, and some of these workflow run-time engine services may depend on functionality supplied by other of these services to complete their startup tasks.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen garantier om rekkefølgen tjenestene som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen er startet av arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren, og noen av disse arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren tjenestene kan avhenger av funksjonalitet som er angitt av andre disse tjenestene å utføre oppgavene oppstart.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: Workflow run-time engine services can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to perform any final startup tasks that require the support of other workflow run-time engine services when the Started event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren services kan overstyre den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å utføre endelige startet oppgaver som krever støtte av andre tjenester, kjøretid motoren arbeidsflyten når Started denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Starts the workflow run-time engine and the workflow run-time engine services.
trans-unit.target: Starter arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren og arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren tjenestene.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that a valid set of core services exists and then starts any services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bekrefter at et gyldig sett av core services finnes, og starter ingen av tjenestene som er avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: There must be one and only one of each of the following core services: a workflow `CommitWorkBatch` service derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> base class and a scheduler service derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> base class.
trans-unit.target: Det må være én av hver av følgende kjernetjenester: en arbeidsflyt `CommitWorkBatch` tjenesten som er avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>basisklassen og en scheduler avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>klassen base.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: If either or both of these core services are missing, the workflow run-time engine supplies the appropriate default service: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> for the workflow `CommitWorkBatch` service and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService> for the scheduler service.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ett av eller begge av disse core services mangler, arbeidsflyt kjøretid motoren leverer tjenesten passende standard: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>for arbeidsflyten `CommitWorkBatch` tjenesten og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService>for planleggingstjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: A persistence service is optional, but there can be at most only one persistence service present.
trans-unit.target: Ingen fast tjeneste er valgfritt, men det kan være maksimalt bare én utholdenhet tjenesten finnes.

trans-unit.source: After it has validated the service configuration, StartRuntime calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> on all of the services that are derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class.
trans-unit.target: Når den validert tjenestekonfigurasjonen, kaller StartRuntime <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>på alle tjenestene som er avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the workflow run-time engine sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren angir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>og oppretter den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot add or remove core services after the workflow run-time engine is started.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke legge til eller fjerne core services når arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren startes.

trans-unit.source: Core services are services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: Core services er tjenester som er avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>klassen, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>klasse, i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klassen, eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: If you call StartRuntime while the workflow run-time engine is running, no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller StartRuntime mens arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren pågår, er ingen handling utføres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: There is more than one service workflow <xref uid="langword_csharp_CommitWorkBatch" name="CommitWorkBatch" href=""></xref> service registered with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes mer enn én tjeneste arbeidsflyt <xref uid="langword_csharp_CommitWorkBatch" name="CommitWorkBatch" href=""> </xref> tjenesten som er registrert med denne <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- There is more than one scheduler service registered with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - det er flere planleggingstjenesten som er registrert med denne <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- There is more than one persistence service registered with this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - det finnes mer enn én fast-tjeneste som er registrert med denne <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow run-time engine is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når arbeidsflyten kjøretid godkjenningsmotoren er stanset.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> method raises the Stopped event after it has invoked the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method implemented by each of its services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>Metoden viser stoppet-hendelsen når den har startet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metoden implementeres av hver av tjenestene som er avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee about the order in which these workflow run-time engine services are stopped, and some of these services may need to preserve some functionality that is relied on by other services until they too are stopped.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen garantier om rekkefølgen som disse arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren tjenestene er stoppet, og noen av disse tjenestene bør beholde noen av funksjonene som er spredde seg ved av andre tjenester før de for er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: Such services can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to perform any residual shutdown logic when the Stopped event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Slike tjenester kan overstyre den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å utføre noen gjenværende avsluttet logic når stoppet denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Stops the workflow run-time engine and the run-time services.
trans-unit.target: Stopper arbeidsflyten kjøretid-motor og kjøretid-tjenester.

trans-unit.source: This method causes the workflow run-time engine to unload each of its workflow instances, stop all of its services that are derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class, set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to `false`, and raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden vil arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren vil fjerne alle dennes arbeidsflytforekomster, stopper alle tjenestene som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klasse må du angi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>til `false`, og Aktiver den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: To shut down the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> gracefully, call StopRuntime before you call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Avsluttes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>kall webområdet, StopRuntime før du kaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> is already disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> er allerede fjernet av.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en arbeidsflytforekomst er avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowAborted occurs after all pending work for the workflow instance is cleared, but before the workflow instance is invalidated in memory.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowAborted inntreffer etter at alle ventende jobb for arbeidsflyten forekomsten er fjernet, men før arbeidsflyten ugyldiggjøres forekomst i minnet.

trans-unit.source: You can abort a workflow instance by calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte en arbeidsflytforekomst ved å kalle <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For this event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: For denne hendelsen avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>for hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157352).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance has completed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en arbeidsflytforekomst er fullført.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowCompleted is raised after the workflow instance has completed but before the instance is invalidated in memory.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowCompleted oppstår når arbeidsflytforekomsten er fullført, men før forekomsten ugyldiggjøres i minnet.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> and its output parameters.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted>hendelsen avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>og tilhørende utdataparametere.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance is created.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en arbeidsflytforekomst som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the WorkflowCreated event after the workflow instance is completely constructed but before activities are processed.
trans-unit.target: Motoren for arbeidsflyten kjøretid opphøyer hendelsen WorkflowCreated etter arbeidsflytforekomsten bygges fullstendig, men før aktiviteter behandles.

trans-unit.source: For this event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: For denne hendelsen avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>for hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance enters the idle state.
trans-unit.target: Skjer når en arbeidsflytforekomst inaktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the WorkflowIdled event when the workflow instance enters an idle state; for example, when the workflow is waiting for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity to complete.
trans-unit.target: Motoren for arbeidsflyten kjøretid opphøyer WorkflowIdled-hendelse når arbeidsflytforekomsten blir inaktiv; for eksempel når en arbeidsflyt venter på en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>aktivitet for å fullføre.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>

trans-unit.source: For this event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: For denne hendelsen avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>for hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow instance is loaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når arbeidsflytforekomsten lastes inn i minnet.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowLoaded occurs after the persistence service has restored the workflow instance, but before the workflow run-time engine begins to execute any activities.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowLoaded oppstår når utholdenhet-tjenesten har gjenopprettet arbeidsflytforekomsten, men før arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren begynner å utføre aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: For the WorkflowLoaded event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: For hendelsen WorkflowLoaded avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>for hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of a workflow instance is persisted.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når tilstanden til en arbeidsflytforekomst beholdes.

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance can be persisted for many reasons.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflytforekomsten kan beholdes mange grunner.

trans-unit.source: For example, the host can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.UnLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on a workflow instance, or the workflow run-time engine can persist a workflow instance because the instance is idle or because an atomic scope has completed.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel verten kan kalle <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.UnLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>på en arbeidsflytforekomst eller arbeidsflyten kjøretid engine kan gjøre en arbeidsflytforekomst fordi forekomsten er inaktiv eller fordi et atomic omfang er fullført.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.UnLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a persistence service is present in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>, WorkflowPersisted is raised by the runtime after the state of the workflow instance is saved to memory.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen fast tjeneste i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>, WorkflowPersisted starter av kjøretiden etter statusen til arbeidsflytforekomsten som er lagret i minnet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: If a persistence service is not present, the event is still raised but the instance state is not saved.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen fast tjeneste ikke finnes, hendelsen oppstår fremdeles, men tilstanden forekomsten er ikke lagret.

trans-unit.source: If the WorkflowPersisted event occurs because the workflow instance is being unloaded, it is followed by a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hendelsen WorkflowPersisted inntreffer fordi arbeidsflytforekomsten som blir lastet ut, etterfølges av en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded>hendelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded>

trans-unit.source: For the WorkflowPersisted event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: For hendelsen WorkflowPersisted avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>for hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when execution of a workflow instance is resumed following a suspension.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kjøring av en arbeidsflytforekomst startes på nytt etter en utestengelse.

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the WorkflowResumed event just before the workflow instance is scheduled.
trans-unit.target: Motoren for arbeidsflyten kjøretid opphøyer hendelsen WorkflowResumed like før arbeidsflytforekomsten er planlagt.

trans-unit.source: The WorkflowResumed event is usually raised because of an explicit call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Resume%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowResumed denne hendelsen oppstår vanligvis på grunn av et eksplisitt kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Resume%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Resume%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, the workflow run-time engine can temporarily suspend an instance to perform an operation, for example, to apply a workflow change.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren kan avbryte imidlertid midlertidig en forekomst til å utføre en operasjon, for eksempel, endrer arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the WorkflowResumed event is raised when the runtime resumes execution of the workflow instance following the operation.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet oppstår WorkflowResumed hendelsen når kjøretiden gjenopptar kjøringen av arbeidsflytforekomsten etter operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: For the WorkflowResumed event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: For hendelsen WorkflowResumed avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>for hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance has been started.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en arbeidsflytforekomst er startet.

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the WorkflowStarted event after the workflow instance is started by scheduling the root activity for execution.
trans-unit.target: Motoren for arbeidsflyten kjøretid opphøyer hendelsen WorkflowStarted når arbeidsflytforekomsten er startet av planlegging roten aktiviteten for kjøring.

trans-unit.source: For this event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: For denne hendelsen avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>for hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance is suspended.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en arbeidsflytforekomst er midlertidig stoppet.

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance can be suspended by the host through a call to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A> method, by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity, or implicitly by the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflytforekomsten avbrytes av verten via et kall til den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A>metoden, av en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>aktivitet, eller implisitt av arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the workflow run-time engine temporarily suspends the instance when it applies dynamic changes to the instance.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren midlertidig stoppes midlertidig forekomsten når det gjelder dynamiske endringer for forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: For the WorkflowSuspended event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> and a string that describes the reason the instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: For hendelsen WorkflowSuspended avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>og en streng som beskriver hvorfor forekomsten ble utsatt.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: To be added.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en arbeidsflytforekomst avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: The workflow can be terminated by the host through a call to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A> method, by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, or by the workflow run-time engine when an unhandled exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten kan avsluttes av verten via et kall til den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A>metoden, av en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>aktivitet, eller ved kjøretid arbeidsflytmotoren når det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the WorkflowTerminated event after the workflow instance is terminated, but before it is invalidated in memory.
trans-unit.target: Motoren for arbeidsflyten kjøretid opphøyer hendelsen WorkflowTerminated når arbeidsflytforekomsten avsluttes, men før de ugyldiggjøres i minnet.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> and information about the reason the instance was terminated in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted>hendelsen avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>og informasjon om årsak forekomsten ble avsluttet i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow instance is unloaded from memory.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når arbeidsflytforekomsten fjernes fra minnet.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance can be unloaded from memory by an explicit call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A>, or implicitly by the workflow run-time engine according to its own semantics.
trans-unit.target: En arbeidsflytforekomst kan lastes ut fra minne ved et eksplisitt kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A>, eller implisitt av arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren i henhold til sin egen semantikk.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the workflow run-time engine unloads a workflow instance if the instance becomes idle and the runtime has a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> added for which <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnloadOnIdle%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren fjerner en arbeidsflytforekomst Hvis forekomsten er inaktiv og kjøretiden har en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>legges til som <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnloadOnIdle%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnloadOnIdle%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the WorkflowUnloaded event after the state of the workflow instance has been successfully persisted but before the instance is invalidated in memory.
trans-unit.target: Motoren for arbeidsflyten kjøretid opphøyer hendelsen WorkflowUnloaded når statusen til arbeidsflytforekomsten er vellykket lagret, men før forekomsten ugyldiggjøres i minnet.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> event precedes the WorkflowUnloaded event.
trans-unit.target: Derfor en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted>hendelsen kommer før hendelsen WorkflowUnloaded.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnLoaded> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnLoaded>hendelsen avsenderen inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>for hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnLoaded>

trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]behandler hendelser, se [bruker hendelser](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
